PC Number: 2014-0502

Date: 2014-05-01

Whereas the Honourable Georgette Sheridan, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling her from the due execution of her office and has tendered her resignation;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice,

 

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Georgette Sheridan; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Georgette Sheridan an annuity of $197,000, commencing as of the date of the making of this Order and continuing during her life.


Attendu que l’honorable Georgette Sheridan, juge de la Cour canadienne de l’impôt, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Georgette Sheridan;

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Georgette Sheridan, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 197 000 $, payable à compter de la date de prise du présent décret.
